original: Lyttkens, Ragnar, stadsingenjör, Halmstad, f. 31/3/87 i Halmstad av civ:ing. Emil L. o. Mina Hagstedt. G. 16 m. Märtha Cervin. Barn: Arne f. 17, Bertil 20, Eva 26. — Mog:ex. i Halmstad 05, civ:ing:ex. v. CTH (VoV) 09. Stud:resa t. Tyskl., Frankr., Ital. m. komm:koll. stip. 26. Ing. v. stadsing :kont. i Malmö 10-11, v. Hälsingborgs stads byggn:kont. 11-13, bitr. stadsing. i Halmstad 13-19, stadsing. i Ludvika 19-22, -stadsing. o. förest. f. vattenv. i Halmstad sed. 22. Ordf. i fören. f. Halmstads natursk. o. förskön. 26-34, styr :led. i Sv:es komm:tekn. fören. 34-43 o. led. av dess stadspl :komm., initrtag. t. Halmstads ing:fören., hed :led. i Halmstads flygkl. o. ing:iÖTen. Skr.: Halmstads vattenverk 1885-1935, ett flert. art. i Komm:tekn. Tidskr., Fören. Gamla Halmstads årsbok samt dagspr. Hobby : sportfiske.
translated: Lyttkens, Ragnar, city engineer, Halmstad, b. 31/3/87 in Halmstad to civil engineer Emil L. and Mina Hagstedt. Married on 16th to Märtha Cervin. Children: Arne b. 17, Bertil b. 20, Eva b. 26. - Graduated from high school in Halmstad in 1905, graduated as a civil engineer from Chalmers University of Technology in 1909. Went on study trips to Germany, France, and Italy with municipal scholarships in 1926. Worked as an engineer at the city engineering office in Malmö from 1910-1911, at Helsingborg's city building office from 1911-1913, assistant city engineer in Halmstad from 1913-1919, city engineer in Ludvika from 1919-1922, and city engineer and head of water supply in Halmstad since 1922. Served as chairman of the association for Halmstad's nature and beautification from 1926-1934, board member of the Swedish Municipal Technical Association from 1934-1943, and member of its city planning committee. Initiated the Halmstad Engineering Association. Honorary member of Halmstad's flying club and engineering association. Writings: Halmstad's waterworks 1885-1935, several articles in the Municipal Technical Journal, the Old Halmstad's Yearbook Association, and daily newspapers. Hobby: sport fishing.
